original_text: Fearing that we would be dashed against the rocks, they dropped four anchors from the stern and prayed for daylight.
korean_text: 암초에 걸릴까 하여 고물로 닻 넷을 내리고 날이 새기를 고대하니라

sentences.original_text: Fearing that we would be dashed against the rocks
they dropped four anchors from the stern
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 선미에서 닻 네 개를 내렸고
